fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company (Company Unique ID).

fields.name: comCd
fields.remarks: Short code used to identify the company (Company Code).

fields.name: comName
fields.remarks: Official name of the company (Company Name).

fields.name: comNameOrg
fields.remarks: Original or initial registered name of the company (Original Company Name).

fields.name: comTaxNo
fields.remarks: Tax identification number of the company (Company Tax ID).

fields.name: comTSNo
fields.remarks: Business registration number or trade license number of the company (Trade Registration Number).

fields.name: comOwner
fields.remarks: Name of the legal representative or owner of the company (Company Owner/Representative Name).

fields.name: comClass
fields.remarks: Type of business entity (e.g., LLC, Corporation, Partnership) (Company Classification).

fields.name: comItem
fields.remarks: Main business activity or service provided by the company (Main Business Item or Service).

fields.name: bankCd
fields.remarks: Code of the primary bank used by the company (Primary Bank Code).

fields.name: bankName
fields.remarks: Name of the primary bank used by the company (Primary Bank Name).

fields.name: accNo
fields.remarks: Primary bank account number of the company (Primary Bank Account Number).

fields.name: depositor
fields.remarks: Name of the account holder for the primary bank account (Primary Account Holder Name).

fields.name: bankCd2
fields.remarks: Code of the secondary bank used by the company (Secondary Bank Code).

fields.name: bankName2
fields.remarks: Name of the secondary bank used by the company (Secondary Bank Name).

fields.name: accNo2
fields.remarks: Secondary bank account number of the company (Secondary Bank Account Number).

fields.name: depositor2
fields.remarks: Name of the account holder for the secondary bank account (Secondary Account Holder Name).

fields.name: bankCd3
fields.remarks: Code of the tertiary bank used by the company (Tertiary Bank Code).

fields.name: bankName3
fields.remarks: Name of the tertiary bank used by the company (Tertiary Bank Name).

fields.name: accNo3
fields.remarks: Tertiary bank account number of the company (Tertiary Bank Account Number).

fields.name: depositor3
fields.remarks: Name of the account holder for the tertiary bank account (Tertiary Account Holder Name).

fields.name: secName
fields.remarks: Name of the security contact person for the company (Security Contact Person Name).

fields.name: post
fields.remarks: Postal code of the company's address (Postal Code).

fields.name: addr1
fields.remarks: First line of the company's address (Address Line 1).

fields.name: addr2
fields.remarks: Second line of the company's address (Address Line 2).

fields.name: addr
fields.remarks: Full address of the company (Full Address).

fields.name: addrMap
fields.remarks: GPS coordinates or map location of the company (Map/GPS Address).

fields.name: logoPath
fields.remarks: File path to the company's logo (Company Logo Path).

fields.name: logoFile
fields.remarks: File name of the company's logo (Company Logo File Name).

fields.name: logoFileOrg
fields.remarks: Original file name of the company's logo (Original Logo File Name).

fields.name: stampPath
fields.remarks: File path to the company's digital stamp or seal (Digital Stamp Path).

fields.name: stampFile
fields.remarks: File name of the company's digital stamp or seal (Digital Stamp File Name).

fields.name: stampFileOrg
fields.remarks: Original file name of the company's digital stamp or seal (Original Stamp File Name).

fields.name: qrCodePath
fields.remarks: File path to the company's QR code image (QR Code Path).

fields.name: qrCodeFile
fields.remarks: File name of the company's QR code image (QR Code File Name).

fields.name: qrCodeFileOrg
fields.remarks: Original file name of the company's QR code image (Original QR Code File Name).

fields.name: remark
fields.remarks: Additional notes or remarks about the company (Additional Notes).

fields.name: ipAddr
fields.remarks: Authorized IP address for accessing the system (Authorized IP Address).

fields.name: ipAddrYn
fields.remarks: Indicates whether IP address restriction is enabled (Y/N) (IP Restriction Enabled).

fields.name: state
fields.remarks: State or province where the company is located (State/Province).

fields.name: city
fields.remarks: City where the company is located (City).

fields.name: county
fields.remarks: County or district where the company is located (County/District).

fields.name: routingNo1
fields.remarks: Routing number for the primary bank (Bank Routing Number 1).

fields.name: routingNo2
fields.remarks: Routing number for the secondary bank (Bank Routing Number 2).

fields.name: routingNo3
fields.remarks: Routing number for the tertiary bank (Bank Routing Number 3).

fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

menu-desc: Retrieves member details based on company ID and user ID.

input.description: This API retrieves detailed member information based on company ID and user ID.

fields.name: userid

output.description: The API returns a JSON object containing detailed member information.

fields.name: retCode

error.name: retCode
error.remarks: Result code(If fail the code will be 'ERROR')

example.updReason: Bank account changed due to new payroll requirements

fields.name: retCode

fields.name: retCode

error.name: retCode

menu-desc: Retrieves bonus benefit details based on the given criteria.

input.description: This API retrieves bonus summaries based on the specified criteria, including company ID, user ID, summary type (monthly or yearly), and optional date range.

fields.name: type
fields.remarks: 1 (retrieve data from Pay_Calc_1 for monthly summary), 2 (retrieve data from Pay_Calc_2 for yearly summary)

fields.name: date1
fields.remarks: Start date for search with format YYYYMMDD

fields.name: date2
fields.remarks: End date for search with format YYYYMMDD

output.description: This API returns a JSON object containing bonus benefit details, including payment date, user rank, and total amount. The response is structured as a JSON object with success and error handling.

menu-desc: Displays bonus payment details by month based on the selected criteria for a specific user

input.description: This API allows users to search for bonus payment records by specifying a company ID, user ID, and date range. Users can filter results based on monthly or yearly summaries. The response supports pagination for efficient data retrieval.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: User ID for whom the data is retrieved

output.description: Bonus monthly search results displaying payment dates and total amounts based on the selected criteria.

fields.name: amt1 - amt15
fields.remarks: Amount pay name 1 -> 15 (Visibility controlled by Bonus settings)

menu-desc: Retrieves benefit calendar details for a specific company and user.

input.description: The getBenefitCalendar API retrieves benefit-related data for a user based on the specified company, user ID, and month. This API is used to populate the benefit calendar with relevant information.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: User ID for whom the data is retrieved

fields.name: yyyymm
fields.remarks: Year and month in YYYYMM format

output.description: This API returns a JSON string containing benefit-related details for a specific user, company, and month. The response includes payment date, total amount, tax deductions.

fields.name: payDay
fields.remarks: Day of the month for the payment

fields.name: trueAmt
fields.remarks: Actual amount received after tax deductions

menu-desc: Retrieves bonus analysis details for a specific company, user, and year.

input.description: The bonusAnalysicGird API retrieves a detailed analysis of bonuses received by a user within a specified year. The data is aggregated by month and categorized by different bonus types, providing a comprehensive view of total earnings for each period.

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Company ID associated with the user.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: User ID for whom the bonus data is retrieved.

fields.name: year
fields.remarks: The year for which the bonus analysis is retrieved (format: YYYY).

output.description: This API returns a JSON string containing benefit-related details for a specific user, company, and month. The response includes payment date, total amount, tax deductions, and the actual amount received after tax.

fields.name: giveDate
fields.remarks: The bonus distribution month in YYYYMM format.

fields.name: amt1 - amt15
fields.remarks: Amount pay name 1 -> 15 (Visibility controlled by Bonus settings)

fields.name: totalAmt
fields.remarks: Total bonus amount for the corresponding month.

menu-desc: Retrieves a summary of bonus amounts for a specific company and user.

input.description: The bonusAnalysicGirdSum API retrieves the total bonus amounts categorized by different types for a user in a given year.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: User ID for whom the data is retrieved

output.description: The bonusAnalysicGirdSum API returns a JSON object containing the total bonus amounts for different categories.

fields.name: amt1 - amt15
fields.remarks: Total Amount pay name 1 -> 15 (Visibility controlled by Bonus settings)

menu-desc: Retrieves a summary of bonus payments for a specific company and user in a given year, including payment types, total amounts, highest received payment, and percentage distribution.

input.description: The bonusAnalysicChart1 API retrieves the distribution of bonus amounts for a specific user in a given year, categorized by payment types. It provides total amounts, the highest received payment, and percentage distribution of each bonus type.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: User ID for whom the data is retrieved

output.description: The bonusAnalysicChart1 API returns a JSON object containing the distribution of bonus amounts for a user in a given year, categorized by payment types. It includes the total amount for each category, the highest received amount, and the percentage share of each category.

fields.name: rate
fields.remarks: Percentage contribution of this category to total bonuses

menu-desc: Retrieves the highest monthly bonus amount for a specific company and user in a given year, ensuring all months are represented.

input.description: The bonusAnalysicChart3 API retrieves the highest bonus amount distributed per month for a user in a given year, ensuring all months are included in the response.

fields.name: userid
fields.remarks: User ID for whom the data is retrieved

output.description: The bonusAnalysicChart3 API returns a JSON object containing the monthly bonus amounts and related data.

fields.name: totalAmt
fields.remarks: Total bonus amount for the month

fields.name: Max_Amt
fields.remarks: The highest bonus amount recorded across all months of the queried year

menu-desc: Retrieves the list of available pay titles for a given company.

input.description: The TitlePay API fetches the pay names and codes associated with a company.

output.description: The TitlePay API returns a JSON object containing a list of pay titles with their corresponding details.

fields.name: Num
fields.remarks: Numeric representation of the pay code

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: ctrCd
fields.remarks: Country code in ISO 3166 format (e.g., VN, KR, JP)

fields.name: ctrName
fields.remarks: Country name in the local language (e.g., Việt Nam, 대한민국)

fields.name: ctrNameEng
fields.remarks: Country name in English (e.g., Vietnam, South Korea)

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: kindName
fields.remarks: Name of the category or type

fields.name: workYn
fields.remarks: Whether or not work is being processed (Y/N)

fields.name: taxNo
fields.remarks: Tax number or business registration number

fields.name: refDate
fields.remarks: Reference data reflection date and time

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: status
fields.remarks: Status of the code: Active (1) or Withdrawn (0)

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: workUser
fields.remarks: User ID who last updated configuration

fields.name: oUsePointDay
fields.remarks: Days allowed to use points after earning

fields.name: oUsePointFullDay
fields.remarks: Point expiration full period in days

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: rankCd
fields.remarks: Rank code (2 digits for independent systems, or 4 digits for integrated systems: 2-digit company code + 2-digit unique code)

fields.name: rankRateAmt
fields.remarks: Discount rate based on amount (used for financial calculations)

fields.name: rankRatePv
fields.remarks: Discount rate based on PV (Point Value), used in point-based systems

fields.name: rankColor
fields.remarks: Display color for this rank (e.g., HEX code or color name)

fields.name: rankTopYn
fields.remarks: Flag indicating if this is the top rank (Y/N). Used in data statistics and analysis

fields.name: downRank
fields.remarks: Lower rank code in case of a downgrade. Not visible on the UI; must be updated directly in the database

fields.name: refCnt
fields.remarks: Total reference count for this rank

fields.name: refCntTerm
fields.remarks: Terminated reference count (references that have been deactivated or removed)

fields.name: useYn
fields.remarks: Usage flag (Y/N). Indicates whether this rank is currently in use

fields.name: useYNName
fields.remarks: Display name for usage status (e.g., Active / Inactive)

fields.name: remark
fields.remarks: Additional notes or description about this rank

fields.name: workUser
fields.remarks: User ID of the person who made the last update

fields.name: filePath
fields.remarks: File path for the rank icon or related asset (e.g., image file)

fields.name: comId
fields.remarks: Unique identifier for the company account (8 characters)

fields.name: stateName
fields.remarks: Name of the state or province

fields.name: post
fields.remarks: Short postal code or simplified postal zone

fields.name: addR3
fields.remarks: Tertiary address line (e.g., landmark or additional info)
